title: How to generate several images at one time by main.py(lora)
body:
I don't see some parameters represents the number of the image
so how can i modify the `forward` function to generate such as 4 images at one time?
author: arrowonstr

comments.body: Hi, we added `--num_images_per_prompt` argument, please check

satisfaction_conditions: Provides a way to generate multiple images per prompt without modifying the model's forward function
Supports batch image generation through user-configurable parameters
